column1: Orophin was the brother of [[Haldir]] and [[Rúmil (elf of Lórien)
column2: Rúmil]]. He was one of the [[Galadhrim]] who seldom left Lothlórien and spoke but a little of [[Westron]].

column1: He was one of three wardens of the northern border of Lothlórien met by the [[Fellowship of the Ring

Some days later, when a band of a hundred [[Orcs]] were seen passing the [[Nimrodel]], the three brothers went ahead and spoke with feigned voices, leading them on into the wood. Orophin ran back to warn the Galadhrim and prepare an ambush and fortify the wood.<ref name=ii6/>
